cleaned_text: Dr. Crystal Tack ND LAC Naturopathic Physician344 House Rd Sequim WA, 98382 [Show map](#) About Dr. Crystal Tack is a naturopathic physician practicing in Sequim, WA. Dr. Tack specializes in proactive prevention and treatment. Dr. Tack combines holistic healing methods with traditional solutions to medical illness. Providing both individual and family care, the most common ailments treated are allergies, chronic pain, digestive issues, obesity, heart disease, fertility, menopause, cancer and chronic fatigue syndrome. Naturopathic Physicians place a strong emphasis on natural remedies that add to the broad spectrum of remedies available.
